Stefanie Jackson bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nke ihe osise ya na-ekwu màkà isiokwu nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Africa America na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị US nke ógè a.

A mụrụ Jackson na Detroit ma nata BFA ya na Parsons School of Design na 1979 na MFA ya na Mahadum Cornell na 1988. Ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nkè eserese na eserese na Lamar Dodd School of Art na Mahadum Georgia ugbu a.

E gosipụtara ọrụ Jackson n'ọtụtụ gallery gụnyere Stone Center for the Arts na Mahadum North Carolina na Chapel Hill, The African American Museum (Dallas), na Harriet Tubman Museum na Afro-American Historical and Cultural Society Museum na Philadelphia.

Jackson enwetala ònyìnyé ọrụ pụrụ iche site na National Endowment of the Arts na ọtụtụ onyinye n'otu n'otu site na Georgia Council for the Arts. Adolph na Esther Gottlieb Foundation nyere Jackson onyinye na 2002.

Ihe osise Jackson na-adabere na ahụmịhe ndụ ya yana okwu sara mbárá nke ikpe ziri ezi. Mmetụta ya na-emetụta ụdị dịgasị iche iche gụnyere surrealism na akwụkwọ ndị Africa America. Otu mmetụta dị mkpà na ọrụ Jackson bụ egwu na ọdịbendị Southern blues. Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ Jackson na-ekwu maka ihe omume ndị dị mkpa na akụkọ ihe méré eme nke US na Africa America
Ihe osise ya azaghachila Atlanta Race Riots, mbibi nke New Orleans site na Hurricane Katrina, nsogbu nke ụlọ ọha na eze na Detroit na New Orleans, na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke French nke New Orleans.
N'onwe ya, Jackson na-enweta mkpali site na ọdachi ezinụlọ, gụnyere ọnwụ nwa nwanne ya n'ime ihe ike na Detroit, nke a na-echeta na ihe osise Little Girl Blue.
